title: 如何迁移Minecraft账号(改名，改密保，改邮箱)
author: 北美路人
txt_content:
引用新闻贴：
[快讯] 如果你有个旧的Minecraft用户名

如何迁移Minecraft Unmigrated Account(待迁移账号)
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMTM3MjI1MDUyMA==.html

replies.author: 石中
replies.txt_content: 貌似很有用，收藏了，以后也许能用上！

replies.author: 北美路人
replies.txt_content:
chyx 发表于 2015-11-3 13:18
我的邮箱改不了啊
可以改的√

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content:
熄灭的火把 发表于 2015-11-4 01:52
可以改的√
它提示说Error! Request denied. To get help with changing your e-mail address visit our Support Center. When contacting customer support, make sure that you include your game purchase transaction ID.

https://help.mojang.com/customer ... -your-email-address

replies.author: 北美路人
replies.txt_content:
chyx 发表于 2015-11-4 07:37
它提示说Error! Request denied. To get help with changing your e-mail address visit our Support Cent ...
如果你是正版，那么邮箱里一定能找到transaction ID ，把这个东西和订单号一起邮件给客服就可以了

replies.author: Baron-M
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Baron-M 于 2019-6-24 08:53 编辑 

视频失效没人管。评论水一下立马警告

replies.author: lordlaharal
replies.txt_content:
chyx 发表于 2015-11-4 07:37
它提示说Error! Request denied. To get help with changing your e-mail address visit our Support Cent ...
不用管他，我也有过，但直接登录你的新邮箱就OK了
